reports.name: Board-Ready Cyber Risk Summary
reports.description: Clearly quantify your cyber risk in financial terms, benchmark exposure against peers, and uncover your top risk reduction opportunities.
reports.info: This report translates your security posture into business-ready metrics, helping you prioritize controls by financial impact.
keyBenefits: Understand and communicate your organization’s cyber risk in dollar terms
Justify and prioritize cybersecurity investments with ROI-backed recommendations.

reports.name: Materiality Threshold Analysis
reports.description: Identify which cyber events could trigger material impact thresholds, based on your organization's unique profile.
reports.info: This report supports informed decision-making, effective stakeholder communication, and targeted risk mitigation aligned with regulatory requirements.
keyBenefits: Allowing to to assess the likelihood of financial damages exceeding specific thresholds during a cyber incident.
Support regulatory compliance efforts, including SEC reporting and other global disclosure mandates.
Enhance internal risk management by identifying and prioritizing potential material cyber risks and empower risk appetite and tolerance discussions with quantifiable estimates.
inputsRequired: Thresholds of material cyber incident by loss, number of data records compromised in an incident, and outage duration (optional).

reports.name: Portfolio Risk Aggregation
reports.description: Gain a quantified, portfolio-wide view of cyber risk exposure.
reports.info: This report helps multi-entity organizations and investment firms identify concentrated risks, prioritize high-exposure entities, and uncover strategic opportunities for mitigation and resilience.
keyBenefits: Conduct group-wide cyber loss forecasting (AAL, TVaR, and different return periods)
Identify the relative contribution to annual loss by entity varies by different return periods.
Recognize common risks that has the highest impact across the group
Benchmark entity-level loss-to-revenue ratios
Prioritize cyber investments based on entity contribution to group risk
Acknowledge of the correlation method between entities within the group.

reports.name: Insurance T&C Optimization
reports.description: Align your cyber insurance coverage with real-world exposure.
reports.info: This report delivers risk-adjusted insights to help you identify coverage gaps, optimize policy terms, and ensure premiums reflect your actual risk profile.
keyBenefits: Benchmark your loss estimates vs. policy structure to assess adequacy.
Identify optimal cyber insurance policy structure and coverage.
Simulate and compare multiple coverage postures (e.g. increased limits, lower deductibles).
inputsRequired: Current insurance policy and coverages terms (limit, deductible, premium) (must)
Future insurance policy and coverages terms (limit, deductible, premium) (must)

reports.name: Risk Register Visualization
reports.description: This dashboard-style report consolidates your organization's cyber risk register into a clear, business-aligned view.
reports.info: Designed for executive audiences, this report highlights top risk scenarios and financial exposures to support transparent prioritization and informed board-level decision-making.
keyBenefits: Executive Summary
Prioritization Matrix; visual heat map of risks by impact and likelihood and highlights critical and high-priority scenarios
Top Risks Snapshot
Response Plan Breakdown; Distribution of risks across Mitigate / Accept / Transfer / Avoid
Control Optimization Summary; Top recommended controls and estimate reduction in loss and likelihood
inputsRequired: At least one cyber risk scenario in the register.

reports.name: ROSI Analysis for Security Initiative
reports.description: Quantify the value of a security initiative before it's deployed.
reports.info: This report models potential risk reduction and calculates return on security investment (ROSI), turning 'what-if' scenarios into data-backed business cases.
keyBenefits: Simulated Exposure Reduction
ROSI Calculation
Control Change Summary: List of impacted controls with maturity uplift
Cost vs. Savings Summary
inputsRequired: Select a single security product or initiative for justification (must)
Your implementation costs, additional savings, and timeframe for advanced ROSI calculation.
